title: Ineos Grenadiers Brings in New Management in Bid to Keep Up with Jumbo-Visma, UAE
content:
The once-mighty UK squad overhauls management with a new CEO, head of performance, and race director. Will it work?

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Brings in New Management in Bid to Keep Up with Jumbo-Visma, UAE on Velo.
author: ahood
